title: (x) Punch Studio logo script - Altast Greeting (American Greeting Script) {Patricia}
content:
Anyone out there recognize this? Existing font or custom-drawn?

I’d be grateful for your sharp eyes/wisdom.

Many thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091106134920im_/http:/typophile.com/files/punchstudiologo_3878.jpg)
author: bhogan

comments.content:
Looks like Altast Greeting a.k.a. American Greeting Script (from the Script ID site)

[http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script01Pg1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20091106134920/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script01Pg1.html "http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script01Pg1.html")
Thanks so much, this is right. But after Googling this for a while, I couldn’t figure out where to buy it. It seems originally to have been a Linotype product . . .
Yeah, castcraft seems to sell a version called Alto Greeting but it’s bundled w/a bunch of other fonts -not sure you can buy it individually.
